name: I Got Fired And My Boss Is a Massive Ding-Dong So I'm Going To Destroy This Place To The Ground
name_original: I Got Fired And My Boss Is a Massive Ding-Dong So I'm Going To Destroy This Place To The Ground
description:
Your boss has always been annoying, and recently he told you its your last day on the job, last day, might make the most of it! So you decide to take your revenge by *BREAK*ING as many rules in the office as you can!

---

How to play:

wasd/arrows to move around.

rshift/lshift to sprint.

mouse to aim.

f/space/left mosue button to pick up and throw objects.

Run away from the red manager while breaking as many  rules as you can! You can also throw objects at the manager to stun!
